prompt_used: You simplify complex texts by rewriting them in Easy English.
syntactic_simplification:
Mice are important in neuroscience research. They are a flexible model for scientists. Researchers can control and study mice. This helps them learn about how the brain works. 

In the past, researchers preferred male mice for experiments. They did this because they were worried about female mice. Female mice have hormone cycles. These cycles can cause changes in behavior. This could affect the results of experiments.

paraphrase_or_explanation:
Mice are important in brain research. They are a flexible type of animal that scientists can easily manage and study. This helps them learn about how the brain works.

In the past, researchers preferred to use male mice for tests. They did this because they were worried about female mice. Female mice go through hormone cycles, which are changes in their body that affect their mood and behavior. These changes can make their actions different from male mice. This could change the results of the tests.
original_text: Mice have long been a central part of neuroscience research, providing a flexible model that scientists can control and study to learn more about the intricate inner workings of the brain. Historically, researchers have favored male mice over female mice in experiments, in part due to concern that the hormone cycle in females causes behavioral variation that could throw off results.
